So I'm factoring in a dilution factor of 31% over 2021 which should be easily countered with a single ğŸš€ worthy update from either the Lithium, Gold or Kaolin project. In fact the recent dips might already have the upcoming options priced in since investors expect this dilution.

comment.author: peaandham610

ECS will tend upwards regardless, great business, acquiring Murray Meds was a solid move, and unlike most Pharma stocks it didn't get a pump previously so it's good to have a consistent trending stock. With that said, I don't doubt it'll be pumped at some point, I'll also welcome that.
BRN have made some amazing advancements recently, the Nasa Phase 2 announcement will be welcome news, and with the Nanose and Sniffphone work recently there is so much upside. The issue they have is the cant announce much until they can provide a concise statement of the impact it'll have, and that'll take time.

comment.author: internal-control
comment.body:
Another day of high hopes for XST is upon us.
Twitter, Facebook , Hot copper and of course Reddit has been a circus of anticipation and anxiety over the last few weeks. Fellow retards who have already pre-planning lambos are cringe but loving the energy. I do hope to upgrade from my shitty 2011 mitz lancer.
Tomorrow I honestly believe will be the final nail to fucking send this to 3c+. I donâ€™t know what else XST can do to get the market to wake the fuck up.
There is gas down there and it will be broadcast out to the market soon enough. Due to the proximity of the gas reserves, chances are that two - three Trading halts could happen before the end of next week.
I am salivating at what the final drill results will contain.
Diamond hands are well are truely on ğŸ’ğŸ™Œ
CRL. As per CRL activities report, funding has been secured and drilling is to start Q2 CY - which will be April . Gold price is garbage at the moment but donâ€™t be deterred by the beast that is the Santa Teresa tenement in Mexico. This will rip once a further announcement has dropped.
Fingers and toes crossed for all.

comment.body:
Hard to put a number on it but I love the diversification that CRL possess. With Graphite , Gold and copper interests, Theyâ€™re well equiped for a decent run in 2021.
Due to the severity of Mexicoâ€™s corona virus outbreaks, CRL would be best to focus on their Aus tenements. IMO
Ticks all the boxes for me ğŸ˜

comment.author: x_feather
comment.body:
So I found this amazing potato recipe.
Preheat oven at 230c Peal and chop tattos. Mix 4 table spoons melted butter, salt, pepper, garlic, Italian herbs. Put tattos and mixture into baking dish. Chuck dish in oven - bake 20 minutes. Flip tattos - bake 15 minutes Make a cup of vegetable stock, flip tattos poor stock on - bake another 20 minutes. Grate cheese, bake 15. Eat the tattos.
Shit. Wrong sub. Good luck tomorrow!

comment.body: Yeah I have fingers crossed ECS gonna go ballistic and BRN is just a nice welcome surprise.

comment.author: peaandham610
comment.body:
ECS will tend upwards regardless, great business, acquiring Murray Meds was a solid move, and unlike most Pharma stocks it didn't get a pump previously so it's good to have a consistent trending stock. With that said, I don't doubt it'll be pumped at some point, I'll also welcome that.
BRN have made some amazing advancements recently, the Nasa Phase 2 announcement will be welcome news, and with the Nanose and Sniffphone work recently there is so much upside. The issue they have is the cant announce much until they can provide a concise statement of the impact it'll have, and that'll take time.

comment.body: Hey guys I'm looking into BPH, LRS and RAC. I know they're all pretty well popular but not sure what would be best. Have about 5k total to invest anyone else on these?

comment.author: tynub89
comment.body:
How long you holding for? BPH is at discount but very risky, RAC has consistently mooned but I'm cautious about biotechs, and LRS imo is the safest bet of the three due to its diversified portfolio in halloysite/lithium/copper/gold. More reports due every week.
If it was my money I would put it on IXR as its current price is very discounted 0.048 and also there is a resource report coming at the end of this month. Last report showed a trippling of the estimate and rare earths are in play due to the Chinese supply issue. Also take a look into LTR/NVA which are gold+lithium plays with both having reports due early next month.

comment.author: WowVeryJosh
comment.body:
Nothing has changed fundamentally between last Monday and this Monday, yet the share price is up 100% because of some email pumpers. It's still a med tech company which the sector is renowned for incredibly slow uptake.
This can only end well. Basically if you're that keen on this company, you wait for it to die, then you buy and wait for the next email pump as a part of their "investor coverage" and sell the hype.
